definition: to pass/to spend (time)/measure/limit/extent/degree of intensity/degree (angles, temperature etc)/kilowatt-hour/classifier for events and occurrences

sentences.english: The twisting and moving slowed down, halting the lights.
sentences.chinese: 星雲旋轉和轉動的速度降了下來，亮度也變暗了。

sentences.english: The calculation methods of luminance and illuminance of road surface are discussed in detail.
sentences.chinese: 後又對計算路面亮度和照度的方法進行了詳細的討論。

sentences.english: A single high brightness LED is enough.
sentences.chinese: 只要一個高亮度的LED燈就夠了。

sentences.english: The brightness of this star varies over a period of about 11 months.
sentences.chinese: 這顆變星的亮度變化大約持續11個月。

sentences.english: It's obviously that corrosion-resistance and brightness are much better than those of Zn plating.
sentences.chinese: 實驗結果表明，其耐蝕性和光亮度明顯優於鍍鋅層。

sentences.english: Adjusts the contrast of the touch screen.
sentences.chinese: 調整觸控式顯示幕的亮度。

sentences.english: Multi-stage Brightness Control can fully satisfy any requirements for different uses.
sentences.chinese: 照度調節採用多段調光，能滿足不同手術的亮度需求。

sentences.english: The intensity of the X-ray emission is correlated to thebrightness of the orange coloring.
sentences.chinese: X射線的輻射強度與橙色的亮度相關。

sentences.english: The fifth property is shininess, that you specify with a number.
sentences.chinese: 第五種屬性是亮度，由數值指定。

sentences.english: In additional, the luminance step is applied to detect the penumbra.
sentences.chinese: 另外，提出了亮度步長的方法來檢測陰影中的半影。

sentences.english: "Graduation brightness" lighting switch shall be turned off timely after using.
sentences.chinese: 使用完後應及時關閉“分劃亮度”照明開關。

sentences.english: Because it burns brightly, it is used for illumination; countless homes are still illuminated with oil-burning lamps.
sentences.chinese: 石油的燃燒亮度高，很多人家裏還在用油燈。

sentences.english: Half way up the Brightness Hill, Reed Flute Cave is seven kilometers northwest of the center of Guilin.
sentences.chinese: 半路上的亮度，蘆笛巖是西北七公里的桂林的中心。

sentences.english: In the case of a data input mode, the brightness of the backlighting is reduced.
sentences.chinese: 在數據輸入模式情況下，減小背面光照明的亮度。

sentences.english: The specular surface of edge banding brings different visual effects to you.
sentences.chinese: 鏡面封邊條高亮度的表面，帶給你不同的視覺效果。

sentences.english: Astronomers describe star brightness in terms of magnitude and luminosity.
sentences.chinese: 天文學家用星等和光度來描述恆星的亮度。

definition: contrast (balance of black and white in TV screen setup)/degree of contrast
